title: Data Access Submission Search Result Item

accessRequirementId.description: The id of the access requirement the submission is for

accessRequirementName.description: The name of the access requirement

accessRequirementReviewerIds.description: The list of principal ids that are allowed to review the submission

submitterId.description: The principal ID of the person who created the submission

accessorIds.description: The list of principal ids that are accessors in the submission
